name: gwf-webapp
description: GWF WebApp monorepo - React frontend, Node backend, Python microservice

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend,python" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../python-microservice && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
